DOC.brief_title: Gycabiane and Glycemic Control of Prediabetic Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Cinnamon's effects on blood glucose have been the subject of many clinical and animal studies; however, the issue of cinnamon intake's effect on fasting blood glucose (FBG) in people with prediabetes still remains unclear. The main purpose of this study is to examine the effects of supplementation with Glycabiane, a dietary supplement rich in cinnamon extract, on fast blood glucose of overweight prediabetic subjects in a randomized, placebo-controlled, clinical trial.
